description: Privilege escalation using LD_PRELOAD environment variable
goal:
Explore various methods to escalate privileges on a linux machine using LD_PRELOAD environment variable

This Lab was modeled after the following article: https://www.hackingarticles.in/linux-privilege-escalation-using-ld_preload/
solution:
Access the ssh client in interactive mode

SSH inside the vulnerable container

$ ssh user1@193.20.1.2

The password is "pass123"

Follow the guide at https://www.hackingarticles.in/linux-privilege-escalation-using-suid-binaries/ and explore different ways to gain root access.
author: efrcatu
